channel.title: Fixing GS timers and Starting items *read for more*
channel.description:
Ok first off i need to know how to fix weapon timers for how long until they hit next pvp and mvp (monster vs player). Aswell if you know what the gs real timer is tell me it please.
Now to the starting items, i will explain what i want it to be and possibly you can batch up some codes or tell me where to add it.. I want to it to start with iron scim, 50 m, mind, wind, earth, fire, water, death, caos, and blood runes. Thats all but please on any of these help me any was you can.
-Billy
